Incarnate {4}{R}{G} [i](If you cast this for its incarnate cost, as it resolves, merge it over target creature you own as an Avatar. It keeps all abilities from under it.)[/i]
Up to one target creature you control gets +3/+3 and must be blocked this turn if able.
Trample
Whenever this Revelation attacks, you may cast an unincarnated copy of it. [i](You still pay its costs.)[/i]
